Before sharing sensitive information, make sure you're on a City of Chicago government site. The site is secure. The ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely. Get the new, updated COVID-19 and flu vaccines. They're safe, effective, and can be taken together. Learn more at Chicago.gov/COVIDVax .
